item.title: Upa Lokayukta continues surprise visit to govt establishments in Raichur district
item.description:
<![CDATA[Upa Lokayukta Justice B. Veerappa visited various government departments, public places and many institutions on the second day of his scheduled tour of Raichur district in Karnataka on August 29.
Mr. Veerappa visited the water purification centre at Chicksugur village and inspected the water being supplied to Raichur city.
He ordered filing a suo moto case against the officials concerned after seeing improper disposal of waste at the Solid Waste Resource Recycling Management Unit located near...]]>
item.author: Authors
